Translations.Text: Day ur ieoi ara ar mara d iffe$ i illan deg ieekwan
i illan deg idmaren, a d ivheo meooa
S tidep, assen, Mass nnsen, ippuxebbeo fellasen
Taheuuakt
D acu p theuuakt
Anwa ara k imlen d acu p theuuakt
Ass ideg ara ilin imdanen am iferieiia ibruzzaen
u ara ilin idurar, am tadui iqerdcen
d$a, wanag bu lwezn eeayen
ad yili di tmeddurt igerzen
Wanag bu lwezn fessusen
di maylellif ara d igwri
Anwa ara k imlen d acu t
D times ipzehhiren
Tem$weo tessedha kwen
armi trezfem ar ieekwan
Xaii! Deqqal a ppissinem
Da$en, xaii! Deqqal a ppissinem
Xaii! Lemmer, s tussna itebbten, ara tissinem
war ccekk, times, a p twalim
D$a, s tii utebbet, ara p twalim
D$a, assen, war ccekk, fellawen asteqsi $ef lhawiyyat
S wakud
Ih, amdan, war ccekk, ar di lexsaoa
Kkes ed wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, ippemyenhun ar tidep, ippemyenhun ar uubeo
A ssxev n yal aqeooav alemmam
I ijemmlen ayla, ieeppeb it
Inwa, s wayla, ad iwekkeo
Xaii! Ad ippuveggeo ar Tuevimt
Anwa ara k yinin d acu p Tuevimt
D times n Oebbi i smendagen
i ippalin $ef ulawen
Neppat, ih, t$umm iten
s tgwejda $wezzifen
Day ur twalav ara amek Ixdem, Mass ik, i At Lfil
Day ur Issexoeb ara tixidas nnsen
Iuzen asen d ifoax ikkaten. i
Iieggioen d fellasen id$a$en iweccmen
Irra ten am alim ipwafeen
Ilmend n lemwafqa n Qurayc
Lemwafqa nnsen $ef inig unebdu akked win n tegrist
Awufan ad aabden Mass n Uxxam a
iten Iceccen, ur plaeen, iten Ivemnen, ur ppagwaden
Twalav win inekoen ddin
Winna ipparan agujil akin
Ur t icqi ucci ume$bun
Imeulla, a tawa$it nnsen
Wid istehzayen di teilla nnsen
wid ib$an a ten id walin
u gedlen talalin
Ni$ Nefka yak lufa
eeal i Mass ik, zzlu ieegga
Ih, axuim ik, amengur d neppa
Ini: "a yijehliyen
Ur aabde$ ayen taabdem
Ayen aabde$, kunwi ur t taabdem
Nek, ur d aabad n ayen taabdem
Ayen aabde$, kunwi ur t taabdem
Nekkini, s ddin inu, kunwi s ddin nnwen
Ma iusa d l$elb n Oebbi, akked rrbee
D$a twalav imdanen keccmen ddin n Oebbi, d igrawen
Sbuccaa s ccekoan Mass ik, ssuter aS ssmae. Neppa Izga Issuruf
A nnger ifassen n Abulahab, u a nnegr is
Iwumi yas wayla s, akked wayen ikseb
Ad ioe$ di tmessi m ujajie
akked tmeiiut is, i ipbibbin as$ao
tamrart inzizen, $ef umgaov is
Ini: "Neppa, Oebbi Yiwen
Oebbi, ur T ippissin yiwen
Ur Iuriw, ur T uriwen
Ur illi, d nned iS, yiwen
Ini: "ad iyi Iuueo, Mass n wanqao
Si lhemm n wayen Ixelq
si lhemm n tillas ma ssant
si lhemm n tid ipuuvun di tyersiwin
si lhemm um$ecci, ma iusem
Ini: "ad iyi Iuueo, Mass n yimdanen
Agellid n yimdanen
Oebbi n yimdanen
si lhemm u$way n win ipfezwin
i i$ewwun idmaren n yimdanen
si leonun u seg yimdanen
